column2: Latest;Phnom Penh: A woman named Srey Nang/Neng has not been seen since July 20th after going away with a foreign ‘Barang’ boyfriend she recently met on Facebook.------The 35 year old
column3: who works at VVIP Bar on 136
column4: left her 10 year old son and 4 year old daughter behind
column5: both of whom are now sick.------The manager at VVIP said that she had taken a Sorya bus to Kampot on the 20th and has not been in contact or answered phone calls or messages.------Anybody who may know of her whereabouts are asked to call 0885753753. (Please share)------SOURCE
